Target Corp.’s Travails, in 7 Charts

RegionalQueenslander via Wikimedia Commons

 Originally published by Saint Paul Pioneer Press at https://www.twincities.com/2015/03/20/targets-travails-in-7-charts/   [Archived] 

 Reason for republication:  Degraded Assets 

By Dan Bauman
Date: March 20, 2015

Minneapolis-based Target is looking for $2 billion in savings to help fund the $1 billion it intends to spend on information technology this year, which it counts on for driving growth.
